description: This file appears to be a configuration and build script fragment used in the Yocto Project's bitbake build system for libgcc. It contains build functions such as do_configure, do_compile, and do_install, along with scripts for handling multilib variants and sysroot setup. It is not a traditional source code file like C, C++, Python, etc., but a build/description include file in the meta layers.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment for libgcc by setting up directories and running the configure script.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Builds libgcc using make within the specified build directory.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the built libgcc, moves libraries into appropriate directories, and cleans up unnecessary files.

methods.name: do_multilib_install
methods.description: Handles the installation of multilib variants for libgcc, creating symlinks according to the multilib configuration.

methods.name: get_original_os
methods.description: Determines the original target OS string, adjusting for architecture-specific suffixes like -gnueabi for ARM.

methods.name: do_extra_symlinks
methods.description: Creates symlinks for sysroot and multilib directories ensuring proper library path resolution.
